title: Rachel Dolezal: Choosing To Identify As African-American
teaser: The parents of Rachel Dolezal, the president of the NAACP's Spokane chapter, say she is white and has misrepresented her background. Steve Inskeep talks to Michael P. Jeffries of Wellesley College.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
